name: dry food for cats
title: Vital Balance Senior · dry food for cats · Chicken & cereals
description: Vital Balance dry food for cats Chicken & cereals Duactis - Senior 11+

mainInformation.origin: You can find information about the origin on the packaging in the store.

petFoodBasicInformation.composition: Composition: Chicken (17%) (including bone, meat, skin), dried poultry protein, wholegrain wheat (15%), corn, corn protein meal, wheat gluten, soya meal, pork fat, wheat middlings, dried chicory root (2%), minerals, digest (with added heat treated Lactobacillus Delbrueckii and Fermentum powder 0.025%), Yeasts.
petFoodBasicInformation.additives: Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 38000; Vit D3: 1200; Vit E: 670; mg/kg: Vit C: 140; taurine: 1200; 3b103: (Fe: 49); 3b202: (I: 1.2); 3b405: (Cu: 7.7); 3b503: (Mn: 23); 3b605: (Zn: 79); 3b801: (Se: 0.073).antioxidants.Additives:Nutritional additives:IU/kg: Vit A: 38000; Vit D3: 1200; Vit E: 670; mg/kg: Vit C: 140; taurine: 1200; Iron (II) sulphate monohydrate: (Fe: 49); Calcium iodate anhydrous: (I: 1.2); Copper (II) sulphate pentahydrate: (Cu: 7.7); Manganous sulphate monohydrate: (Mn: 23); Zinc sulphate monohydrate: (Zn: 79); Sodium selenite: (Se: 0.073).antioxidants.

usageInformation.additionalInformation:
PURINA VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® is a special nutritional formula with beneficial functional bacteria that scientifically proven to strengthen your cat's defences.


PURINA VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® is a dual defense formula developed by Purina's nutritionists and veterinarians that contains

- Beneficial functional bacteria that help support your cat's natural antibody production from the inside

- Key nutrients, including Omega 6 fatty acids, which promote healthy skin and coat from the outside

 
The high-quality Purina VITAL BALANCE DUACTIS® recipes are available in a wide range of tasty varieties.

No added colorings, no added artificial flavors and no added preservatives

petFoodStorageInformation.instructions: Feeding guide : Discover also Vital Balance high quality nutrition in wet products with a range of delicious recipes specifically to meet your cat’s tailored needs. The recommended daily amounts should be adjusted to weather conditions, the cat’s level of activity and its physical condition. Clean, fresh drinking water should be available at all times. If you feed Vital Balance for the first time, we recommend to make the change gradually by mixing an increasing amount of Vital Balance with your cat’s current food for 7 days period to allow your cat’s digestive system to adapt to the change. Feeding guide : Discover also Vital Balance high nutrition in delicious pouches to meet your cat’s tailored needs. Kibbles can be fed alone or in combination with Vital Balance WET. The recommended daily amounts should be adjusted to weather conditions, the cat’s level of activity and its physical condition. If you feed Vital Balance for the first time, we recommend to make the change gradually by replacing an increasing amount of your cat’s current food by Vital Balance for 7 days period to allow your cat’s digestive system to adapt to the change. Water facilitates the elimination of waste from the organism. The more your cat will drink, the more her urine will be diluted and less irritating, which will help limit the formation of urinary stones. Make sure to always leave a bowl of fresh and clean water at her disposal. To keep your cat in good health: - feed her with high quality food - encourage water consumption by always providing fresh drinking water - help your cat keep an ideal body weight by following the feeding guidelines and through regular physical activity, by playing with her - change her habits smoothly (such as a move or the arrival of a new pet) to avoid stressing your cat

otherInformation.legalDesignation: Complete pet food for cats aged 11 years and over
otherInformation.distributorStreetAndNumber: (CH) Nestlé Suisse S.A., Nestlé Purina PetCare, CP 352, CH-1800 Vevey

remarks.value: Keep pet food in a cool and dry place.

mainSpecificities.value: Die empfohlenen täglichen Mengen sollten sich je nach Wetter,  dem Aktivitätslevel der Katze und ihrem physischen Allgemeinzustand richten. Sauberes,  frisches Trinkwasser sollte jederzeit zur Verfügung stehen.
